attributes.additional_details: Why are so many roads have roadworks. I have just done over 600 miles in France and not one road work with free-flowing stress free traffic. Every UK motorway and dual carriageway on the way back had lanes closed and more often than not no one working. If these are upgrades will they ever stop because as soon as they finish sometime years another roadwork starts nearby....just an ongoing cycle. Surely there is a better option/s
